title: Solving a Real-World Problen Using a System of Three Equations in Three Variables
body: In the problem posed at the beginning of the section, John invested his inheritance of $12,000 in three different funds: part in a money-market fund paying 3% interest annually; part in municipal bonds paying 4% annually; and the rest in mutual funds paying 7% annually. John invested $4,000 more in mutual funds than he invested in municipal bonds. The total interest earned in one year was $670.
lesson: 7.2 Systems of Linear Equations: Three Variables
